rdt.model

Class SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble

  • java.lang.Object
    • rdt.model.Ensemble
      • rdt.model.MultilabelChainEnsemble
        • rdt.model.SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Model

    public class SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble
extends MultilabelChainEnsemble
    Class to represent an ensemble of MultilabelChainTrees. A SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble contains trees which have been built with the SparseMultilabelChainTreeBuilder. The SparseMultilabelChainTreeBuilder uses special splitters which can handle sparse data well. This model can only be applied on datasets which have only binary attributes. All the other functionalities of the MultilabelChainEnsemble are still the same.
    Author:
    MK

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class rdt.model.MultilabelChainEnsemble

        MultilabelChainEnsemble.ChainType, MultilabelChainEnsemble.PredictType

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble(CollectorPreferences cp, int numTrees, int maxDeep, int maxS, long randomSeed, double percentageLabels, double percentageActiveLabels, int numChainPredict, MultilabelChainEnsemble.PredictType predictType, MultilabelChainEnsemble.ChainType chainType)
      Creates a new SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble with the given information about the learning tasks, the number of trees, the maximal depth of the trees, the minimum number of instances to create a splitter, a seed for the random number generator, the percentage of label-splitters in the ensemble, the percentage of the label-splitters which are activated, the number of how many labels should be predicted with the chain method, the type of prediction and the type how to predict the next label.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble

        public SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble(CollectorPreferences cp,
                                     int numTrees,
                                     int maxDeep,
                                     int maxS,
                                     long randomSeed,
                                     double percentageLabels,
                                     double percentageActiveLabels,
                                     int numChainPredict,
                                     MultilabelChainEnsemble.PredictType predictType,
                                     MultilabelChainEnsemble.ChainType chainType)
                              throws RDTException
        Creates a new SparseMultilabelChainEnsemble with the given information about the learning tasks, the number of trees, the maximal depth of the trees, the minimum number of instances to create a splitter, a seed for the random number generator, the percentage of label-splitters in the ensemble, the percentage of the label-splitters which are activated, the number of how many labels should be predicted with the chain method, the type of prediction and the type how to predict the next label. IMPORTANT "percentageActiveLabels" only exists to do some experiments. To ensure the functionality of the chain methods you have to set the value of this variable equal to 1. "numChainPredict only" exists to do some experiments. To ensure the functionality of the chain methods you have to set the value of this variable higher than the number of labels of the dataset.
        Parameters:
        cp - the information about the learning tasks
        numTrees - the number of trees
        maxDeep - the maximal depth of the trees
        maxS - the minimum number of instances to create a splitter
        randomSeed - the seed for the random number generator
        percentageLabels - the percentage of label-splitters in the ensemble
        percentageActiveLabels - the percentage of the label-splitters which are activated
        numChainPredict - the number of how many labels should be predicted with the chain method (ONLY for specific experiments should the value be chosen below the number of labels)
        predictType - the type of prediction
        chainType - the type how to predict the next label
        Throws:
        RDTException
